data.description: WYSISWYG web browser HEX color selector
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Provides a graphical user interface for a web based application to
    select color numbers in grey scale, web-safe 216 colors, or 24
    megacolors.

    Similar functionality exists in PhotoShop and GIMP??? This may be
    used directly in a web application call to this perl module.

    Should be in the "Graphics" namespace, it allows the user to "pick"
    colors. Hence... Graphics::ColorPicker

    Based on the chapter descriptions, I would choose 8, but it doesn't
    really matter to me.
